subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The left-hander Steven Matz appears ready to jump to the Mets from their Class AAA affiliate, but the Mets would likely need to get rid of a starter before calling him up.
snippet: The left-hander Steven Matz appears ready to jump to the Mets from their Class AAA affiliate, but the Mets would likely need to get rid of a starter before calling him up.
